name: Uneventful Quest
description:
Uneventful Quest was built in less than 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2018

The goal was to create a RPG without combat mechanics. This resulted in a hastily assembled game where you play the role of a slightly paranoid merchant trekking to the next town over to sell your wares.

Thank you for playing :D

Features

- Linear gameplay

- Single button, can work with any controller technically

- 4 color scheme, helps save on power or something

- Random dialog

- No combat or item system so you don't need to worry about complex things

- Programmer graphics, only the best

- No audio, because its distracting anyway

- Less than a minute of gameplay, so you can truly speed run it

Controls
Just use the space button for all controls. It's a single button game.

Note with the web build

 I've found that when you hit space it seems to cause text to flash by rapidly :|
